blogPost.excerpt: http://blocks.wickedtemplates.com/ are an open source collection of layout blocks and components built with Tailwind CSS V2 ready to copy-paste on your Tailwind project.
blogPost.body: http://blocks.wickedtemplates.com/ are an open source collection of layout blocks and components built with Tailwind CSS V2 ready to copy-paste on your Tailwind project.
blogPost.title: WickedBlocks - Tailwind V2 blocks ready to copy paste
blogPost.author: ᴍɪᴄʜᴀᴇʟ ᴀɴᴅʀᴇᴜᴢᴢᴀ

localize.description: http://blocks.wickedtemplates.com/ 是一个开放源码的布局块和组件集合，用Tailwind CSS V2构建，准备复制粘贴到您的Tailwind项目上。
http://blocks.wickedtemplates.com/ 是一個開放源碼的佈局塊和組件集合，用Tailwind CSS V2構建，準備複製粘貼到您的Tailwind項目上。

previous.excerpt: Chatwoot is an open-source omnichannel communication platform built as an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk etc. Chatwoot helps you to connect email, website live chat, social media handles, WhatsApp etc. and manage all your customer interactions from one place.
previous.title: Chatwoot - Open-source customer communication platform

localize.description: Chatwoot是一个开源的全渠道沟通平台，作为Intercom、Zendesk等的替代品。Chatwoot可以帮助你连接电子邮件、网站即时聊天、社交媒体手柄、WhatsApp等，从一个地方管理所有的客户互动。
Chatwoot是一個開源的全渠道溝通平臺，作爲Intercom、Zendesk等的替代品。Chatwoot可以幫助你連接電子郵件、網站即時聊天、社交媒體手柄、WhatsApp等，從一個地方管理所有的客戶互動。

next.excerpt: Refty collects twice as many references in half the time, turning them into actionable insights. Trust long-term experiences over intuition!
next.title: Refty - Reference checks made easy and measurable

localize.description: Refty 用一半的时间收集两倍的参考资料，并将其转化为可操作的见解。相信长期的经验，而不是直觉
localize.tagline: 证明人调查变得简单和可衡量

localize.description: Refty 用一半的時間收集兩倍的參考資料，並將其轉化爲可操作的見解。相信長期的經驗，而不是直覺
localize.tagline: 證明人調查變得簡單和可衡量
